channel.title: Server Message Colour
channel.description:
Hey again people!
Well, now i would like to know something else. :).
How would i change the colour of server messages in my client? Like the messages that the server pops up, such as 'welcome to SEVRERNAME' well, basically for anything in the server code that is a sendMessage message. I need to know how to change the colour of those messages from black to say, blue, as i am getting a darker game frame.
Please help as soon as possible :). BTW I realise this would probably be client-side.
Jube.

item.title: Server Message Colour
item.dc:creator: @Project_Revolution Project Revolution
item.description:
@Project_Revolution wrote:

Not really, I know what you mean, you need to edit sumthig in the client files. Its not server sided =]

Got it…

Read full topic

item.title: Server Message Colour
item.dc:creator: @Sinior_Jube_Head Sinior Jube Head
item.description:
@Sinior_Jube_Head wrote:

lol. what i am saying is changed the players name colour when sending messages and the players text colour when sending messages through the clients files, not the servers files.

So what i mean is that to change the server messages colours, you would probably need to edit somethign in the client files, and NOT server files. ah… confusing.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Message Colour
item.dc:creator: @Project_Revolution Project Revolution
item.description:
@Project_Revolution wrote:

kk so I guess it’s not possible to do it client sided…

Wow what a first day at my new home(MoparScape)…

Read full topic

item.title: Server Message Colour
item.dc:creator: @Sinior_Jube_Head Sinior Jube Head
item.description:
@Sinior_Jube_Head wrote:

i don’t think so as i found how to change player name colour before and after message sent, and the message colour before an dafter, and all was in the client’s client.java (or w\e file in the clients file). I found this via Scarecrows tutorial (runelocus.).

:).

Read full topic

item.title: Server Message Colour
item.dc:creator: @Project_Revolution Project Revolution
item.description:
@Project_Revolution wrote:

Oh okay…looking…

Will edit when found…

By the way… couldn’t that be done server sided?

Just wondering…

Read full topic

item.title: Server Message Colour
item.dc:creator: @Sinior_Jube_Head Sinior Jube Head
item.description:
@Sinior_Jube_Head wrote:

Ah. You don’t see what i mean.

I don’t mean the messages that the client sends through, like the loading message clour, or any of that.

I mean the messages that, well i think all of them are, um activated through the server’s client.java with sendMessage.

ie. when you log in you get the message:

Welcome to GexStr0wns!
Go to the forums at w\e\w\e\w\e
Try ::info, ::commands and ::starter. They will help you a lot!

Those message sthat the server sends through the code

sendMessage(“w\e”);

Please help if you know…

Read full topic

item.title: Server Message Colour
item.dc:creator: @Project_Revolution Project Revolution
item.description:
@Project_Revolution wrote:

Okay so I gave you the text colour to be white which is FFFFFF…

so search you client.java in your client files for what text you want to change.

Before it, it has like 0x(some random numbers+letters)

Go here: http://html-color-codes.com/

Pick a colour and copy the code…

e.g. FF0000 = red and paste it in your client…

(0xFF0000, “Project Revolution is Loading.”, 23693, c1 / 2 - 26 - byte1, c / 2);

Just change the numbers, don’t add anything or it wont work…

Read full topic

item.title: Server Message Colour
item.dc:creator: @Sinior_Jube_Head Sinior Jube Head
item.description:
@Sinior_Jube_Head wrote:

Project, who said i was smart. :eek: i am pretty… stupid. :|. So…

  1. When you say that, do you know the HEX colour for Blue…? like a cyan blue. Or electric blu (light blue, dark blue w\e)

  2. Do you mean to do this in the client somewhere?

and 3. Umm… lol you say line before… so the line above the sendmessage code then? if so, how would i put it in? and i thought hex colours were only in the client, not the server… the welcome message is in my server’s client.java btw (u know this but… meh).

So ah… yeh. Could you please clear some of these things up a bit for me please? :). Thx if you can.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Message Colour
item.dc:creator: @Project_Revolution Project Revolution
item.description:
@Project_Revolution wrote:

You gotta use the HEX colours like before the line you type welcome to such and such client it has something like: 0xFFFFFF

Any smart person could figure it out from there…

Read full topic

item.title: Server Message Colour
item.dc:creator: @Sinior_Jube_Head Sinior Jube Head
item.description:
@Sinior_Jube_Head wrote:

Dude no…

It doesn’t work.

I have just tried BOTH of those again.
Neither do anything cept 1 throws errors at me -.- and 1 comes up as following when in game:

@blu@Welcome to Gexstr0wns!

LAME. :).

Can someone please like… help me ? I need to know how to change server messages colour. Which is 99% likely to be done client-side as that is how you change the colour of players text and their name.

Jube.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Message Colour
item.dc:creator: @empir3z empir3z
item.description:
@empir3z wrote:

this

“@bla@Welcome to Sevrername.”

Tested that and it works

Read full topic

item.title: Server Message Colour
item.dc:creator: @Sinior_Jube_Head Sinior Jube Head
item.description:
@Sinior_Jube_Head wrote:

LOL.

Ehe…hehehe…

No.

That would not work :). Well, at least, i tried it… and no. It didn’t work. ( i tried it about… 1 month ago…).

So yeah. Anyone know how to change server message colour?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Message Colour
item.dc:creator: @empir3z empir3z
item.description:
@empir3z wrote:

@three first letter of your color@ “quote”
example
@blu@ “Welcome to Sevrername”
